title.narrative: C4D (02) MTR - STANDARDS, GUIDELINES, AND MODELS FOR PRACTICE

description.narrative: MTR - Standards, Guidelines, and models for practice, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: How' s/ Cross-Goal result By 2021, countries apply effective behaviour change and community engagement, as well as human rights strategies that contribute directly and through policy and system strengthening to the full realisation of child rights

title.narrative: MTR - Standards, Guidelines, and models for practice

description.narrative: OUTPUT 2: STANDARDS, GUIDELINES AND TECHNICAL SUPPORTEquip UNICEF and partners with tools and resources to guide quality Social and Behavior Change strategies and interventions across sectors and settings and provide technical support to the field | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/04/2021
